    Introduction to epicovr Multinomial modeling Animation of projected weekly cases

Animation of projected weekly cases

Source: vignettes/VariantAnimation.Rmd
VariantAnimation.Rmd
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
  library(epicovr)
  library(nnet)
  library(emmeans)
  library(tidyverse)
})
theme_set(EpicovrTheme())
gisaid_metadata <- readRDS(file = "~/github/2021_Covid19_surveillance/data/all_metadata/metadata_tsv_2022_03_17.rds")
gisaid_india <- FilterGISAIDIndia(gisaid_metadata_all = gisaid_metadata)

gisaid_india_shared_month <- gisaid_india %>%
  filter(Host == "Human") %>%
  mutate(State = "India") %>%
  group_by(MonthYearCollected, State, lineage_collapsed) %>%
  summarise(total_sequences = n()) %>%
  drop_na() %>%
  rename(MonthYear = MonthYearCollected) %>%
  arrange(MonthYear) %>%
  mutate(MonthYearChar = as.character(MonthYear))
gisaid_india_shared_month$MonthYearChar <- factor(gisaid_india_shared_month$MonthYearChar, levels = as.character(sort(unique(gisaid_india_shared_month$MonthYear))))
gisaid_india_shared_month$MonthYearNumeric <- as.numeric(gisaid_india_shared_month$MonthYearChar)
fit1_month <- multinom(lineage_collapsed ~ scale(MonthYearNumeric), weights = total_sequences, data = gisaid_india_shared_month, maxit = 1000)
fit2_month <- multinom(lineage_collapsed ~ MonthYearNumeric, weights = total_sequences, data = gisaid_india_shared_month, maxit = 1000)

fit3_month <- multinom(lineage_collapsed ~ ns(MonthYearNumeric, 2), weights = total_sequences, data = gisaid_india_shared_month, maxit = 1000)

BIC(fit1_month, fit3_month)
BIC(fit1_month, fit2_month)
fit1_model <- multinom(lineage_collapsed ~ DateWeek, weights = total_sequences, data = gisaid_india_shared_dateweek_selected, maxit = 1000)
fit1_preds <- predict(fit1_model, newdata = confirmed_subset_dateweekwise_long_india_sel, type = "prob")
x <-    sweep(x = fit1_preds, MARGIN = 1,STATS = confirmed_subset_dateweekwise_long_india_sel$total_sequences, FUN =   '*')
mode(x) <- "integer"



confirmed_subset_dateweekwise_long_india_prob <- cbind(confirmed_subset_dateweekwise_long_india_sel[, c("DateWeek"), drop=FALSE], x)

confirmed_subset_dateweekwise_long_india_prob$State <- NULL
india_cases_pred_prob_sel_long <- data.table::melt(setDT(confirmed_subset_dateweekwise_long_india_prob), id.vars = c("DateWeek"), 
                                                   variable.name = "variant")

the_anim<- ggplot(india_cases_pred_prob_sel_long %>% filter(value>50), 
                  aes(x = DateWeek, color = variant, y = value,group=variant)) +
  geom_line() +
  theme_classic() +
  labs(x = "Specimen date", y = "Estimated cases\n\n") +
  #scale_x_date(breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(6), ) + expand_limits(x=lubridate::ymd("2022-03-12"))+
  scale_x_date(date_breaks = "1 month", date_labels =  "%b %Y") +  expand_limits(x=lubridate::ymd("2022-02-22"))+
  theme_bw() +

  #scale_color_brewer(type="qual", palette="Set3") + 
  scale_y_continuous(label=scales::comma) + coord_cartesian(ylim=c(0,NA))+
  scale_color_manual(values=voc_colors)+#met.brewer("Juarez", 6)) + 
  #geom_label(hjust = 0,aes(label=variant),nudge_x=10)+ theme(legend.position = "none")+
geom_point() + 
hrbrthemes::theme_ipsum() + # theme_pubr() +
  # xlab('\nDate submitted') +
  # xlab('') +
  # ylab('Number of variants (non-cumulative)\n') +
  xlab("") +
  ylab("Estimated cases (per week)\n\n\n") +
  ggtitle("Estimated cases (per week) in India by variant") +
  labs(subtitle = "Estimation based on a multinomial fit to weekly genomic surveillance data deposited to GISAID",
        caption ="**Source: gisaid.org<br>**")+#\uA9** Saket Choudhary") +
  theme(
    strip.text.x = element_text(size = 10, face = "bold", hjust = 0, color = "#225ea8"),
    strip.background = element_blank(),
    panel.grid.minor.x = element_blank(),
    panel.border = element_blank(),
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)
  ) +
  theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 10, color = "black")) +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(face = "bold"), # , hjust = 0.5),
    plot.caption = element_markdown(hjust = 0),
  ) 
the_anim
